TopicTitle: Would anyone be interested in this "flag pack?"

Articles.Content:
So, I've been thinking.

I'm planning on adding in some distinctive military insignia to my flags, not for the flags themselves, but for spaceplanes and the like. It'll be pretty cool if it works, and if it does, I was wondering if anyone would download it, or at the very least, be interested. I'd probably do mostly Air Force and Navy squadron insignia, but I would eventually branch out if the pack was successful. If anyone has any questions or comments, let me hear them. Thanks.
The quote marks have me worried. What is it "really" if not an actual map pack?

The quotation marks were just there since I wasn't sure what the proper term was for a collection of flags.

It's just a flag pack, I suppose.

I'm a little new around here, so that would be my bad.
I always love new flags feel free to share.
